entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rogersville

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023
